Title: Microsoft Robotics Developer Studio with Lego NXT 2.0 Mindstorms
Description: Microsoft Robotics Developer Studio project with a Lego NXT 2.0 MINDSTORMS robot. The robot uses a compass, ultrasound distance sensor, two bumpers and two motors. It goes around while trying to avoid obstacles and draws a picture of its current state on a WPF application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Microsoft Robotics Developer Studio project with a Lego NXT 2.0 MINDSTORMS robot. The robot uses a compass, ultrasound distance sensor, two bumpers and two motors. It goes around while trying to avoid obstacles and draws a picture of its current state on a WPF application.
